home.heroTitle: Authentic Indian & Pakistani Groceries in Stockholm
home.heroSubtitle: From aromatic spices to premium Basmati rice, halal meat to fresh produce - everything you need for authentic South Asian cooking. Delivered to your door in Stockholm.
home.specialOffers: Special Offers on Indian & Pakistani Groceries
home.freshArrivals: Fresh Arrivals - New Stock Just In

features.freeDeliveryDesc: Free shipping on orders over 500 SEK within Stockholm. Fast & reliable delivery to your doorstep.
features.halalCertifiedDesc: A wide range of 100% Halal certified meat and meat products, ensuring quality and trust.
features.authenticBrandsDesc: Sourced directly from top Indian & Pakistani brands like Haldiram, National Foods, and Shan.
features.freshProduceDesc: Daily restock of fresh vegetables, exotic fruits, and traditional Asian ingredients.

about.title: About Ideal Indiska
about.subtitle: Discover why we're Stockholm's premier destination for authentic South Asian flavours.
about.storyTitle: From Passion to Your Local Grocery Store
about.storyP1: Ideal Indiska was born in 2020 from a deep-rooted love for the authentic flavours of our homeland and a desire to share them with the vibrant community in Stockholm. We noticed a need for a dedicated space where people could find high-quality, genuine Indian and Pakistani groceries without compromise.
about.storyP2: From our humble beginnings at Bandhagen Centrum, we have grown into Stockholm's premier destination for South Asian cooking essentials. We take pride in being a bridge to home for thousands of families across Sweden.
about.storyP3: We carefully select our products to ensure you find everything you need to create authentic Indian and Pakistani meals, from everyday staples to special occasion delicacies.
about.spicesDesc: Whole and ground, sourced for freshness from brands like Shan, MDH, and TRS.
about.grainsDesc: The finest Basmati rice (India Gate, Guard), Atta, and diverse lentils.
about.produceDesc: Seasonal vegetables and herbs (karela, bhindi, tinda) essential for cooking.
about.treatsDesc: Favourite snacks from brands like Haldiram's and traditional sweets.
about.exploreBrands: Explore our full range of 150+ brands online.

contact.title: Contact Us & Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We love connecting with our customers! Whether you visit us in person at our store in Bandhagen Centrum or have a question about your online order, we're here to help.
contact.whatsappDesc: Fastest response for order status or product availability.
contact.callDesc: Give us a call during store hours for immediate help.
contact.emailDesc: For detailed inquiries or feedback, send us an email.
contact.findingAnswersDesc: Check our FAQ for quick answers about delivery, payments, and products.
contact.newCustomerDesc: Create an account for exclusive offers and faster checkout.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ordering authentic Indian and Pakistani groceries in Stockholm. Can't find your answer? We're here to help.
faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our customer support team is ready to help.
faq.cat1q1: How do I place an order?
faq.cat1a1: Placing an order is easy! Simply browse our website, add your desired items to the shopping cart, and proceed to checkout. You'll enter your delivery address, choose from Store delivery, pickup, or DHL options, and complete payment securely.
faq.cat1q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.cat1a2: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through our secure Stripe gateway. We also offer Klarna, Swish, Google Pay, and Apple Pay. All transactions are encrypted and secure.
faq.cat1q3: Do I need an account to place an order?
faq.cat1a3: No, you can check out as a guest. However, creating an account lets you view order history, save your address for faster checkout, and receive exclusive first-purchase offers and promotions.
faq.cat1q4: Where can I buy Indian and Pakistani spices in Stockholm?
faq.cat1a4: You can find the widest selection of authentic Indian and Pakistani spices at Ideal Indiska LIVS, both at our Bandhagen store and online. We stock brands like Shan, MDH, National Foods, and TRS.
faq.cat1q5: Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?
faq.cat1a5: Yes! We're one of Stockholm's most competitively priced stores. For very large restaurant or catering orders, please contact us via WhatsApp for custom volume pricing.
faq.cat2q1: Do you deliver Indian groceries in Stockholm?
faq.cat2a1: Absolutely! We offer our own local delivery service across all of Stockholm. We're proud to be a premier indisk mataffär offering matleverans i Stockholm. Visit our Delivery Information page for full details.
faq.cat2q2: Is there free delivery in Stockholm?
faq.cat2a2: Yes! FREE local delivery on all orders of 500 kr or more anywhere in Stockholm. Orders between 300-499 kr have a flat 30 kr delivery fee.
faq.cat2q3: Do you deliver to the rest of Sweden?
faq.cat2a3: Yes! We deliver nationwide using our trusted partner, DHL. Shipping costs are calculated automatically at checkout based on weight and your delivery address.
faq.cat2q4: Do you deliver to other countries in Europe?
faq.cat2a4: Yes! We deliver across Europe (excluding fresh and perishable items) via DHL. Shipping costs are calculated automatically at checkout based on weight and destination.
faq.cat2q5: Will I have to pay customs duties in EU countries?
faq.cat2a5: No. Since we're shipping from Sweden (an EU member) to other EU countries, there are no additional customs or import duties. The checkout price is your final price. (Standard import rules apply for non-EU countries like Norway.)
faq.cat3q1: What happens if an item I ordered is out of stock?
faq.cat3a1: We operate a busy physical store, and sometimes items may sell out before our online inventory updates. If this happens, we'll contact you immediately with the option of a full refund or a suitable replacement product.
faq.cat3q2: How do you ensure the freshness of vegetables and frozen items?
faq.cat3a2: Freshness is our priority. Fresh produce and frozen goods are currently only available for our local Stockholm delivery service. This ensures a controlled cold chain from our store to your door.
faq.cat3q3: I'm looking for a specific brand or product not on your website.
faq.cat3a3: We're always expanding our range! If there's a specific brand or item you'd love to see, email us at info@ideallivs.com. We value your suggestions!
faq.cat3q4: What grocery brands do you stock?
faq.cat3a4: We carry over 150 brands including India Gate, Guard, Shan, National Foods, Haldiram's, Ashoka, Ahmed Foods, and many more South Asian favorites.
faq.cat3a5: Yes, we have a dedicated section for 100% Halal certified meat and poultry. Quality and authenticity are guaranteed for all our Halal products.
faq.cat4a1: We accept returns on non-perishable items within 14 days of receipt, provided they're unopened, unused, and in original packaging. Perishable items (fresh produce, frozen goods) are not eligible for return. Read our complete Refund and Return Policy for full details.
faq.cat5q1: Do you have a physical store?
faq.cat5a1: Yes! Visit us at Bandhagsplan 4, 12432 Bandhagen Centrum, Stockholm. Find us on Apple Maps and Google Maps.
faq.cat5a2: Monday-Friday: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Sunday: 11:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Hours may vary on holidays.

delivery.title: Grocery Delivery Information
delivery.subtitle: From our store in Bandhagen to your door. We offer free delivery across all of Stockholm and fast shipping throughout Sweden and Europe.
delivery.welcomeText: Welcome to Ideal Indiska Livs! We make it easier than ever to get your favourite authentic Indian and Pakistani groceries.
delivery.introText: We are proud to offer FREE delivery across all of Stockholm on qualifying orders, as well as fast and flexible shipping options to every corner of Sweden through our trusted partner, DHL. Whether you are in Bandhagen, Södermalm, Kungsholmen, Norrmalm, Vasastan, Östermalm, Gamla Stan, or the surrounding suburbs, getting the taste of home is just a few clicks away.
delivery.stockholmSubtitle: We offer two convenient delivery methods for all our customers within the Stockholm area.
delivery.localDeliveryTitle: 1. Ideal Indiska Local Delivery (Our Own Service)
delivery.localDeliveryIntro: Enjoy our personalized local delivery service with great flexibility and value.
delivery.freeDelivery: FREE Delivery: On all orders of 500 kr or more across all of Stockholm.
delivery.standardDelivery: Standard Delivery: For orders between 300 kr and 499 kr, a flat delivery fee of just 30 kr applies.
delivery.minimumOrder: Minimum Order: The minimum order for our local delivery service is 300 kr.
delivery.coverageText: Our local delivery covers the entire Stockholm region, including central areas like Södermalm, Kungsholmen, Norrmalm, Vasastan, and Östermalm, as well as surrounding communities including Solna, Sundbyberg, Kista, Nacka, Huddinge, and Järfälla.
delivery.sameDayTitle: Special Same-Day Evening Delivery for Our Neighbours:
delivery.sameDayText: For our local community in and around Bandhagen, we offer a special Same-day evening delivery service.
delivery.sameDayAreas: Areas: Bandhagen, Högdalen, Hagsätra, Rågsved, Stureby, Farsta, Älvsjö.
delivery.sameDaySchedule: Schedule: Place your order before 4 PM (16:00) to receive your delivery the Same day evening between 7 PM - 10 PM.
delivery.dhlStockholmText: If you prefer the flexibility of DHL or have a larger/heavier order, you can also choose DHL for delivery within Stockholm. Shipping costs are calculated dynamically based on weight and size.
delivery.swedenTitle: Shipping to the Rest of Sweden via DHL
delivery.swedenSubtitle: We are thrilled to serve customers across all of Sweden with no minimum order requirements.
delivery.reliablePartnerDesc: We use DHL to ensure your groceries arrive safely and promptly anywhere in Sweden.
delivery.calculatedRatesDesc: Fees are based on weight and location, calculated automatically at checkout.
delivery.pickupText: You are always welcome to place your order online and collect it from our store in Bandhagen at no extra cost.
delivery.pickupHow: How it Works: Select "Local Pickup" at checkout. You will receive an email or SMS notification when your order is ready.
delivery.commitmentText: We understand the importance of receiving your groceries in perfect condition. We take great care in packing every order, ensuring that fresh produce, frozen items, and fragile goods are handled appropriately to maintain their quality from our store to your door.
delivery.deliveryHelpDesc: Contact our delivery team via WhatsApp.

goteborgMalmo.title: Göteborg & Malmö Delivery
goteborgMalmo.subtitle: From Stockholm to South and West Sweden. We deliver authentic Indian and Pakistani groceries to Göteborg, Malmö, and surrounding areas via DHL.
goteborgMalmo.introHighlight: Serving South Sweden with authentic Indian and Pakistani groceries.
goteborgMalmo.introText: We understand that families in Göteborg, Malmö, and all across Skåne and West Sweden crave the authentic tastes of home. We are dedicated to delivering high-quality groceries directly to you via our reliable shipping partner, DHL.
goteborgMalmo.goteborgCentral: Central Göteborg: Centrum, Inom Vallgraven, Linné, Majorna-Linné, Örgryte-Härlanda.
goteborgMalmo.goteborgGreater: Greater Göteborg: Mölndal, Partille, Lerum, Kungsbacka, Kungälv.
goteborgMalmo.malmoDistricts: Malmö Districts: Centrum, Västra Hamnen, Rosengård, Södra Innerstaden, Limhamn-Bunkeflo, Husie.
goteborgMalmo.malmoSurrounding: Surrounding Areas: Lund, Helsingborg, Trelleborg, Ystad, Landskrona.
goteborgMalmo.goteborgScheduleText: Deliveries on Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday. Order 24h in advance.
goteborgMalmo.malmoScheduleText: Deliveries on Wednesday and Saturday. Flexible time slots available.
goteborgMalmo.popular1: Fresh Indian & Pakistani vegetables and herbs
goteborgMalmo.popular4: South Indian specialties (dosa mix, sambhar powder)
goteborgMalmo.popular5: Traditional Indian and Pakistani snacks and sweets
goteborgMalmo.noMinimumOrderDesc: Shop as little or as much as you need.
goteborgMalmo.questionsDesc: Chat with us on WhatsApp for regional delivery inquiries.

europeDelivery.title: Europe Delivery
europeDelivery.subtitle: Authentic Indian & Pakistani Groceries, Delivered Across Europe. Fast and reliable shipping from Stockholm to your doorstep.
europeDelivery.introHighlight: Bringing the tastes of India and Pakistan to your doorstep, anywhere in Europe.
europeDelivery.introText: At Ideal Indiska Livs, we are proud to expand our reach beyond Sweden to serve our customers across the entire European continent. Whether you are in Germany, France, the Netherlands, or any other EU country, you can now enjoy our extensive selection of authentic South Asian groceries delivered directly to your home via DHL.
europeDelivery.noMinimumOrderDesc: Order exactly what you need. There is no minimum purchase requirement for European shipping.
europeDelivery.calculatedRatesDesc: Shipping fees are calculated automatically at checkout based on your location and the weight of your order.
europeDelivery.countriesIntro: We ship to all EU member states and several other European countries, including:
europeDelivery.countriesNote: Don't see your country? Contact us via WhatsApp to check availability.
europeDelivery.dhlParcelDesc: The most common and cost-effective option for residential deliveries across Europe.
europeDelivery.insuredTrackedDesc: All international shipments are fully insured and include a tracking number for your peace of mind.
europeDelivery.perishablesDesc: Note: Fresh & frozen items are for Stockholm local delivery only.
europeDelivery.europeanSupportDesc: Have questions about shipping to your specific country?

promo.exclusiveDiscounts: Exclusive discounts on Dates, Rice, Spices & More

seo.premierDestination: Your Premier Destination for Indian & Pakistani Groceries in Stockholm
seo.seoP1: Based in the heart of Bandhagen, Ideal Indiska LIVS is Stockholm's most authentic source for South Asian groceries. We offer a wide range of Indian spices, premium Basmati rice, and fresh Halal meat.
seo.seoP2: Looking for authentic brands? We stock Shan, National Foods, Haldiram's, and Ashoka. Whether you live in Stockholm or order online, we bring the true taste of India and Pakistan to your kitchen.
seo.whyChooseUs: Why Stockholm Chooses Ideal Indiska LIVS
seo.unmatchedFreshness: Unmatched Freshness: Our fresh produce and vegetables are restocked daily to ensure the highest quality for your kitchen.
seo.europeanDelivery: European-Wide Delivery: Not in Stockholm? No problem. We ship our authentic pantry staples across all of Europe via DHL.
seo.customerFirst: Customer-First Service: Our team is passionate about South Asian cuisine and is always here to help you find the right ingredients for your next masterpiece.
seo.secureOnline: Secure Online Shopping: Enjoy a seamless, mobile-friendly shopping experience with secure payments via Klarna, Swish, and Stripe.

search.searchPlaceholderLong: Search for fresh produce, groceries, and more...

deals.heroDesc: Prepare for a blessed month with Stockholm's best prices on dates, rice, and Iftar essentials.
deals.seoP1: At Ideal Indiska LIVS, we believe that authentic cooking shouldn't break the bank. Our weekly Special Offers bring you the best discounts on high-quality Indian and Pakistani staples right here in Stockholm.
deals.seoP2: From 5kg bags of premium Basmati Rice to essential spices and dals, we regularly discount the items your family uses most. Our deals are updated every week, so be sure to bookmark this page!
deals.whatToLook: What to look for this week:
deals.grabThem: Limited time offers - grab them before they're gone!
deals.noDealsDesc: We don't have any special offers at the moment, but check back soon for amazing deals!

brandsPage.heroTitle: Shop Your Favorite Indian & Pakistani Brands
brandsPage.heroP1: At Ideal Indiska LIVS, we bring you a curated selection of the most trusted and beloved Indian and Pakistani grocery brands, serving Stockholm since 2020.
brandsPage.heroP2: Explore authentic spices from Shan, snacks from Haldiram's, or quality staples from ITC and KTC. Our directory is designed to help you find precisely what you need for your kitchen.
brandsPage.seoTitle: Why Shop by Brand at Ideal Indiska LIVS?
brandsPage.seoP1: We understand that when it comes to authentic Indian and Pakistani cooking, the brand matters. That's why we've partnered with the most prestigious and trusted names in South Asian groceries.
brandsPage.seoP2: Every brand we stock has been carefully selected for its commitment to quality, authenticity, and taste. From traditional family favorites to modern innovations, our brands deliver the genuine flavors of India and Pakistan.
brandsPage.seoP3: Browse by your favorite brand, discover new ones, and order everything you need from the comfort of your home. We offer fast delivery across Stockholm and throughout Sweden.
brandsPage.visitStore: Visit our store in Bandhagen or shop online at ideallivs.com for the complete range of Indian and Pakistani brands in Stockholm.

brandsGrid.noResults: No brands found matching your criteria.

blog.ramadanDescription: Get ready for Ramadan with our curated list of Suhoor power-foods and Iftar essentials. Discover special deals on Atta, Rice, Dates, and more.
blog.fikaTitle: The Indian Fika: 5 Savory Snacks for Tea
blog.fikaDescription: Experience the perfect blend of Swedish tradition and South Asian spice. Discover the best samosas and namkeen.
blog.noCustomsTitle: Why Buying from Sweden Saves Money
blog.noCustomsDescription: Learn how to get Indian groceries delivered across Europe with zero hidden customs fees and fast shipping.
